uganda.gloss: a landlocked republic in eastern Africa

ugandan shilling.gloss: the basic unit of money in Uganda

ugli.gloss: large sweet juicy hybrid between tangerine and grapefruit having a thick wrinkled skin

ugli fruit.gloss: hybrid between grapefruit and mandarin orange
large sweet juicy hybrid between tangerine and grapefruit having a thick wrinkled skin

ugo buoncompagni.gloss: the pope who sponsored the introduction of the modern calendar (1572-1585)

ugrian.gloss: one of the two branches of the Finno-Ugric family of languages

ugric.gloss: one of the two branches of the Finno-Ugric family of languages

ugly.gloss: inclined to anger or bad feelings with overtones of menace
